chapter.title: Special Header
chapter.p: Use special header links to create new cards with a single click!

steps.item: Add URL link on this page to create a new card based on card types in your project. For example, to create a link called +Story for card type Story in your project, type in "+Story" and link it to this URL: /projects/project_identifier/cards/new?properties[type]=Story
steps.note: Starting from 13.2.2, the value query and project macros are not supported as part of URL. See related Knowledge Base article.
Make sure you choose the right Protocol. For Mingle in the Cloud, it should always be HTTPS.
steps.item: Saving this page will result in a link '+Story' being displayed across all pages of Mingle. These links will be available to all users of the project
New cards created using this link use card defaults specified in the project admin section
